raft.jpct.bones
Class SkinClip

java.lang.Object
  raft.jpct.bones.SkinClip
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<JointChannel>
public class SkinClip
extends Object
implements Serializable, Iterable<JointChannel>

A single animation for a Skeleton. A Clip consists of JointChannels. There is at most one Channel for each joint in Skeleton. A Clip is analogue of sub sequence in jPCT's Animation.

This class is adapted from Ardor3D.

See Also:
JointChannel, Serialized Form
